original_title: Indian woman arrested at BIA with gold worth over Rs. 120mn
original_body_lines: An Indian national was apprehended at the Bandaranaike International Airport (BIA) on charges of trying to smuggle a consignment of gold valued at over Rs. 120 million.
The suspect was reportedly found in possession of 5.5 kilograms of gold.
Sri Lanka Customs officers at BIA detained the woman upon her arrival from Dubai.
